logging.title: Log Output
logging.description: Whether the data should be logged.

oneOf.title: First N Entries
oneOf.description: Log first N entries per stream.

max_entry_count.title: N
max_entry_count.description: Number of entries to log. This destination is for testing only. So it won't make sense to log infinitely. The maximum is 1,000 entries.

oneOf.title: Every N-th Entry
oneOf.description: For each stream, log every N-th entry with a maximum cap.

nth_entry_to_log.title: N
nth_entry_to_log.description: The N-th entry to log for each stream. N starts from 1. For example, when N = 1, every entry is logged; when N = 2, every other entry is logged; when N = 3, one out of three entries is logged.

max_entry_count.title: Max Log Entries
max_entry_count.description: Max number of entries to log. This destination is for testing only. So it won't make sense to log infinitely. The maximum is 1,000 entries.

oneOf.title: Random Sampling
oneOf.description: For each stream, randomly log a percentage of the entries with a maximum cap.

sampling_ratio.title: Sampling Ratio
sampling_ratio.description: A positive floating number smaller than 1.

seed.title: Random Number Generator Seed
seed.description: When the seed is unspecified, the current time millis will be used as the seed.

max_entry_count.title: Max Log Entries
max_entry_count.description: Max number of entries to log. This destination is for testing only. So it won't make sense to log infinitely. The maximum is 1,000 entries.
